REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F RM f0363 reute r f BC-DUFF/PHELPS-UPGRADES 03-11 0075

TEXT.TITLE: DUFF/PHELPS UPGRADES BELLSOUTH CORP <BLS> UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Duff and Phelps raised its ratings to DP-1 (AAA) from DP-2 (high AA) on 2.6 billion dlrs in debentures and 150 mln dlrs in notes of South Central Bell Telephone Co, a unit of BellSouth Corp. The rating agency cited the company's strong financial performance, which was achieved by keeping expenses under control and not by relying on raising local phone rates to its customers. Reuter
